data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Souza, Stephanie Pereira De, Takiya, Daniela Maeda (2014): Description of two new species of Portanus Ball, 1932 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Portanini) from Northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3857 (3): 444-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3857.3.7
